name: UnFriendly Fire (JafCraze)
description:
Throw green fire at the enemies But watch out! They'll turn it into deadly red fire

Created for Trijam #79
Theme: If You Play With Fire, You'll Get Burned

MovementArrows, WASD, IJKLShootLeft Mouse ButtonRestartSpace

As always, let me know if you beat my score of 24!
